Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, King Drive, 83rd, Cottage Grove & 79th; WB 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive & 79th, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 79th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via  79th, King Drive, 83rd, Cottage Grove and 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, King Drive and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, California, and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, California, and 26th due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
